plot: The protagonist, Arvind Desai, the son of a businessman, occasionally dates the company's secretary and discusses politics and art with a Marxist colleague.
title: Arvind Desai Ki Ajeeb Dastaan
plot_es: The protagonist, Arvind Desai, the son of a businessman, occasionally dates the company's secretary and discusses politics and art with a Marxist colleague.
plot_en: The protagonist, Arvind Desai, the son of a businessman, occasionally dates the company's secretary and discusses politics and art with a Marxist colleague.

produce.name: National Film Development Corporation of India (NFDC)
